Name: Marvida Family Eco-ex Otium Family Eco Club
Description: This environmentally friendly, award-winning hotel is conveniently situated on the shores of Lake Titreyengöl and just a few steps from the lovely beach of the Mediterranean Sea. Features of the hotel include an extensive aqua park and a wellness centre with hammam. Manavgat, the famous waterfalls and the historic town of Side with its ancient sites are just a short drive away.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
